data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
My module is a simple CGI Script which doesn't try to be the swiss
    army knife of CGI Modules. It's easy to use and less confusing than
    the other two major modules on CPAN, I believe. It handles setting
    the headers and cookies retrieving form data including
    multipart/form-data encodings and sending the page to the browser.
    Anything else would require a different module. I wrote it to fit
    those occasions when CGI.pm or Simple CGI was overkill.
